attributes.long-description:
Ray Gigant is a unique dungeon crawler RPG which combines dungeon crawling adventure with Japanese visual novel like storytelling. Players are introduced to the gripping tale of Ichiya - a young fighter shrouded in mystery. Through progression, players will later get to experience differing perspectives through the eyes of the other main characters - Kyle and Nil.

Ray Gigant adopts a unique style of battle where you will be fighting massive enemies from different perspectives to engage in 3-way view battles. Use the rhythm-based, Slash Beat Mode to unleash deadly attacks while feeling the fate of the heroes and heroine resonate through their bodies!

1 player(s)
2100KB Minimum

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
